entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers this evening. 60 percent chance of flurries over northern sections overnight. Risk of a thunderstorm early this evening. Snow level near valley bottom. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Tuesday 18 April 2023
